CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Collections.​StringToStringTable
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Collections.​StringTable​<string>
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Collections.​StringToStringTable

A general lookup table for mapping one string to another.  This is preferable to a Dictionary<string, string> class because

  • It has a constructor that allows you to initialize it with pairs of strings quickly.

  • All the reasons StringTable is preferable to a Dictionary.

Functions
StringToStringTable
public StringToStringTable (
KeySettings keySettings = KeySettings.Literal
)

Creates an empty table.

StringToStringTable (strings)
public StringToStringTable (
KeySettings keySettings,
params string[] keyvalues
)

Creates a table initialized with the key value pairs in the passed array.
